questions.question_text: "jene _____ vartamān draḍh hoy to te thakī ame hajār gāu chheṭe jaīe to paṇ tenī pāse ja chhīe; ane jene te niṣhkāmī vartamānmā kāchyap chhe ne te jo amārī pāse rahe chhe toy paṇ te lākh gāu chheṭe chhe."
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Vachanamrut Gadhada I-33.

questions.question_text: Which Vachanamrut contains the following quote? “Bāīo dekhīne bhāīo, chheṭerā chāle, Paḍī vastu koīnī, hāthe nav jhāle rāj..."
questions.explanation: This quote is from Kirtan Akshar 3.

questions.question_text: "Aksharnā vāsī vahālo, āvyā avani par, Navkhanḍ dhartīmā Swāmī, chhatrāyā _____ _____..."
questions.explanation: This is a line from the kirtan.

questions.question_text: Which Vachanamrut contains the following quote? "Avani par āvī vahāle satsang sthāpyo, Harijanone kol, kalyāṇno āpyo rāj..."
questions.explanation: This quote is from Kirtan Akshar 1.

questions.question_text: "Ane amane niṣhkāmī bhakta hoy tenā ja hāthnī _____ _____ game chhe."
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Vachanamrut Gadhada I-33.

questions.question_text: Which Vachanamrut contains the following quote? "Pānche vartmān pāḷe, bāīo ne bhāīo, Harijan sangāthe kīdhī, sāchī sagāīo rāj..."
questions.explanation: This quote is from Kirtan Akshar 2.

questions.question_text: "Devnā dev vahālo, dhāmnā Dhāmī, Pragaṭ Prabhunu nām, _____ _____ Swāmī rāj..."
questions.explanation: This is a line from the kirtan.

questions.question_text: Which Vachanamrut contains the following quote? "Premānandnā Swāmī ānandkārī, Potānā jannī vā’le, lāj vadhārī rāj..."
questions.explanation: This quote is from Kirtan Akshar 5.
